shortDescription:
Unauthorized file access in WEB Server in ABB ASPECT - Enterprise v3.08.01; NEXUS Series

 v3.08.01

; MATRIX Series 

 v3.08.01 allows Attacker to execute arbitrary code remotely
vulnerabilityName: abb aspect-ent-12_firmware Improper Validation of Specified Type of Input
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
